  • In Parts Two, Three, and Four we will offer you addition opportunities for payment (further payments of $8 to $40).
  • The computer will randomly select four different participants in this room
    1. One participant will be selected for payment in Part 2
    2. One participant will be selected for payment in Part 3
    3. Two participants will be selected for payment in Part 4

    We will give you instructions for your decisions in each Part in turn.
